attributes.action: Give legal status to people have been living in the UK for more than 10 years
attributes.additional_details:
Majority of immigrants are very well qualified became victim of complex UK immigration law and unknowingly became overstayer and a lot more have developed their family life have kids and family can fill up gap in UK labour workforce and pay taxes.
Overstayer or undocumented immigrants who have been living in UK for more than 10 years should be given immediate status so they can live their life as a normal people.
attributes.background: For someone who is overstayer or without status and has spent a decade in the UK without any criminal record definitely have a reason to choose a miserable life to live in hostile UK environment and not going back home country.
